snippet.title: Old World - Heroes of the Aegean Trailer | 4X Turn-Based Strategy Game
snippet.description:
Old World's Heroes of The Aegean takes you to Ancient Greece for new historical campaigns! Old World and Heroes of the Aegean releases on May 19th. 

Out now ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/597180/Old_World/
Out now ON GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/old_world
Out now EPIC: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/old-world

Check out all Hooded Horse strategy games:
➤ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/HoodedHorse
